citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The licensee has been exhibiting goats off site on weekends since the end of September and has not been submitting
travel itineraries prior to exhibition. Lack of a submitted itinerary cannot ensure for the tracking of the animals. Exhibitors
exhibiting animals at any location other than their approved site that includes an overnight stay are required to submit an
itinerary no fewer than 2 days in advance of any travel. The itinerary shall contain complete and accurate information
concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for exhibition at any location other than the person’s approved site.
Correct before next traveling exhibition.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(c) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The licensee has been exhibiting goats off site on weekends since the end of September and has not been submitting 
travel itineraries prior to exhibition. Lack of a submitted itinerary cannot ensure for the tracking of the animals. Exhibitors 
exhibiting animals at any location other than their approved site that includes an overnight stay are required to submit an 
itinerary no fewer than 2 days in advance of any travel. The itinerary shall contain complete and accurate information 
concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for exhibition at any location other than the person’s approved site. 
Correct before next traveling exhibition. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: GRAY WOLF / GREY WOLF / TIMBER WOLF
